issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.baidu.com/s?tn=25017023_2_dg&ch=5&ie=utf-8&word=steam](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.baidu.com%2Fs%3Ftn%3D25017023_2_dg%26ch%3D5%26ie%3Dutf-8%26word%3Dsteam) ### Comment > 此网址为steam盗版网站。它会高度模仿正版steam并且引诱下载它以欺骗不知情的用户。所以我希望你们能够在用户第一次进入时予以警告和提醒。非常感谢！ > This website is a Steam pirated website. It will highly imitate genuine Steam and lure download to deceive unaware users. So I hope you can provide warnings and reminders when users enter for the first time. Thank you. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/eywmvw6x41s0okss88wksgcgo8cg8s8dgsy2aos6rw.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: remove unused rules

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.51

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

-

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Turkish filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

```
! ||intersinema.com/static/cicekci300x600.jpg


! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/27514
intersinema.com###musthead
intersinema.com##.shareBig

! https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/89755
intersinema.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "atob", "googlefc")
intersinema.com#$#body { overflow: visible !important; }
intersinema.com#$#body div.fc-ab-root { display: none !important; }
@@||intersinema.com^$generichide


! https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-https-www-intersinema-com.25339/
intersinema.com##[href*=".hit.gemius.pl"]

! https://forum.adguard.com/index.php?threads/resolved-missed-2-background-ad.6816/#post-62947
intersinema.com###ps_sag
intersinema.com###ps_sol
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:

Сегодня попробовал поблокировать некоторые назойливые элементы в вк, но Адгуард почему-то не среагировал на это. Тогда я переустановил Адгуард, но теперь он начал пропускать рекламу (на скриншоте). ### Screenshots
